item.title: Trump tries — again — to deliver a winning message on affordability
item.description: The push comes after weeks of freewheeling speeches and international controversy that reflected Trump’s tendency to derail his own message.

item.title: Fatal shooting in Minneapolis renews protests; video raises questions about DHS account
item.description: The victim in the shooting was identified as Alexander “Alex” Pretti, 37, of Minneapolis.
